# generated by Git for Windows
test -f ~/.profile && . ~/.profile
test -f ~/.bashrc && . ~/.bashrc
alias cls=clear
alias gits="git status"
alias p4="p4merge.exe"
alias gitl="git log --all --color --graph --oneline"
alias lgg='git log --pretty=format:"%C(ul red)%h%Creset -%C(yellow)%d%Creset %s %Cgreen(%cd) %C(ul magenta)<%an>" --date=short --graph -25'
